- Topic: Amendment of City Code for Tour Guides and Tour Planners
- Summary: The ordinance aimed to amend and reordain certain provisions of the City Code to allow employees of the ground transportation bureau to enforce specific regulations related to tour guides and tour planners. It also granted enforcement and citation powers to these employees for the purpose of enforcing the provisions of the City Code. Noncompliance with the provisions would constitute an offense subject to punishment by a fine and/or imprisonment.
- Ordinance Number: 33464
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Passed - (7 YEAS, 0 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 0 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The ordinance passed without any amendments.
- Tags/Keywords: City Code, Tour Guides, Tour Planners, Enforcement, Ground Transportation
- UID: 635e1280-83b2-4312-83de-4dbdf9c36ed9

- Topic: Appropriation of American Rescue Plan Act (ARPA) funds
- Summary: This ordinance aimed to amend the city's operating budget of revenues and expenditures for the year 2021 to appropriate American Rescue Plan Act (ARPA) funds provided to the City of New Orleans. The funds were intended to support the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic response, economic recovery, and restoration of government services impacted by the reduction in revenue due to the pandemic.
- Ordinance Number: 33465 (revenues), 33466 (expenditures)
- Votes Summary:
    Vote 1: Passed - (7 YEAS, 0 NAYS, 0 ABSTAIN, 0 ABSENT)
- Decision/Key Actions: The ordinances passed without any amendments.
- Tags/Keywords: American Rescue Plan Act (ARPA), Operating Budget, Pandemic Response, Economic Recovery, Government Services
- UID: 635e1280-83b2-4312-83de-4dbdf9c36ed9
